message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CR, cs.DS 

This paper is about evaluation metrics for ad-hoc retrieval and search result diversification systems, which are typically studied in the field of information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a new metric, which involves adapting an existing metric (Rank-Biased Precision), and evaluating it in experiments. This suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), computational linguistics (cs.CL), cryptography and security (cs.CR), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
